ygData.subject: RE: Gimmee Gimmee!
ygData.msgSnippet: Gak.  I hate beggers, but I also don t play anon unles my guild is in the Planes, so I get a lot of tells from newbies wanting free handouts.  I, like
ygData.messageBody:
Gak. I hate beggers, but I also don't play anon unles my guild is in the
Planes, so I get a lot of tells from "newbies" wanting free handouts. I,
like Harmonic, try to answer every tell that comes to me regardless whether
it's a 50 Paladin asking me to go to Plane of Sky or a level 1 monk named
"Jakrabit". What I have settle into telling the beggers, and seems to work
well (i.e. they don't flame me afterwards) is "/t jakrabit I'm sorry, I have
a policy against giving handouts. If I gave stuff to everyone that asked
I'd have nothing myself. Nothing personal."

[46 Bard] Crier (Half Elf) <Seekers of Norrath> ZONE: work

> I'm not sure if it's given the "age" and popularity of the Xegony
> server; or perhaps the influx of XMas newbies with no understanding of the
> dynamics of the game; but it seems like the past couple months I seem to
> constantly get begs from new characters for me to give them stuff.
>
> Slyde 35 - Xegony
